name: Special Jumpy Dumpty Dodoco
description: A gift for having fun with Klee in Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure, as designed by Lisa. It looks exactly like the Special Jumpy Dumpty Dodoco, and now this pair of best friends are here to stay in the Realm Within!\nKlee went home early every day to use Albedo's scrapbook as a reference, and finally managed to craft it! According to Klee, "I hope it'll remind you of the fun we had together and blast away your troubles and boredom!"
